question: List all hotels and pods that cost 150.
sql_query1:
SELECT Hotels.Name 
FROM Hotels
WHERE (Hotels.AccomodationType = "Hotel" OR Hotels.AccomodationType = "Pod") AND Hotels.Price = 150
sql_query2:
SELECT Hotels.Name 
FROM Hotels
WHERE Hotels.AccomodationType = "Hotel" OR Hotels.AccomodationType = "Pod" AND Hotels.Price = 150
interpretation1: Which hotels that cost 150 and which pods have the same price?
interpretation2: Provide a list of all hotels and also provide a list of pods that cost 150.
